author: cnbc.com
title: Abercrombie & Fitch Co. to Report Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2017 Results on March 7, 2018
text:
NEW ALBANY, Ohio, Feb. 16, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Abercrombie & Fitch Co. (NYSE:ANF) will be holding its quarterly earnings conference call for all interested parties on Wednesday, March 7, 2018, at 8:30 a.m. EST. A press release detailing the company’s fourth quarter and full year results is expected to be issued shortly after 7:30 a.m. EST.
What: Abercrombie & Fitch Co. Fourth Quarter 2017 Earnings Conference Call When: 8:30 a.m. EST, Wednesday, March 7, 2018 Where: www.abercrombie.com How: Live over the internet: Log on to the web at the above address, or call: Domestic Dial-In Number: 1-800-239-9838 Domestic Replay Number: 1-888-203-1112, conference ID number 6672338 International Dial-In Number: 1-323-794-2551 International Replay Number: 1-719-457-0820, conference ID number 6672338 The call will be archived and can be accessed by visiting the company’s website at www.abercrombie.com .
A presentation of fourth quarter and full year results will be available on the company’s website at www.abercrombie.com under the Investors tab at approximately 8:00 AM, EST on Wednesday, March 7, 2018.
For further information, call:
Investor Contact:
Brian Logan
Abercrombie & Fitch
(614) 283-6751
Investor_Relations@anfcorp.com
Media Contact:
